rows.segment_description: The Family of Apps segment primarily generates revenue from selling advertising placements on Meta's suite of applications. This segment enables marketers to reach people across a range of marketing objectives, such as generating leads or driving awareness, through ads on Meta's platforms. The segment also includes other revenue generated from these applications.
rows.text_snippet: AI glasses and on the web. It's designed to help people learn, get things done, create content, and connect with others to make the most of every moment. We report financial results for two segments: Family of Apps (FoA) and Reality Labs (RL). rows.segment_description: Family of Apps (FoA) encompasses Meta's core social and communication platforms, with revenue mainly derived from advertising placements sold to marketers. These ads help businesses connect with users for various objectives, including lead generation and brand awareness, and the segment also includes other related revenue streams.

rows.segment_description: The Reality Labs segment focuses on developing technologies and products that help people learn, get things done, create content, and connect with others. This segment includes revenue from products and services related to augmented and virtual reality, as well as other associated revenue streams.
